Allow to use NFC tags in programs
Allow to control Raspberry Pi computers
Get help on how to configure the connection settings
Ali želite menjati na nov objekt?

Da bi lahko uporabljali program Pocket Code in druge, ki so del projekta Catrobat, se morate strinjati s pogoji uporabe in jim natančno slediti med uporabo tega in naših drugih izvršljivih datotek. Oglejte si spodnjo povezavo za njihovo natančno formulacijo.\n\n
You attempt to use Pocket Code together with Parrot\'s AR.Drone. We strongly remind you to abide to Parrot\'s terms of use for the drone and to Catrobat\'s terms of use for Pocket Code.

Pocket Code je programsko okolje in tolmač visualnega programskega jezika Catrobat. (za Android naprave)

 Licenca: GNU AGPL v3
 Za natančne podrobnosti o licenci klikni na spodnji link.

Pocked Code za delovanje potrebuje zunanji zapisljiv pomnilnik, kot so kartice SD, a ga ni našel.\nPoskusi zunanji pomnilnik narediti zapisljiv ali vstavite SD kartico, nato pa poskusite znova.

Variable \"%1$s\" is used in both programs. If programs use the same variable name they cannot be merged. Please rename the variable in one of the programs and try again.
List \"%1$s\" is used in both programs. If programs use the same name for their lists they cannot be merged. Please rename the list in one of the programs and try again.
